summary: Added Stage 6a continuous handoff loop to skill-implementer and skill-lean-implementation. Loop auto-resumes partial completions unless requires_user_review=true or iteration limit reached.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary with loop design, stop conditions, and verification results

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented continuous subagent handoff loop in both implementation skills. Added Stage 6a with iteration tracking, stop condition checks (implemented/blocked/failed/requires_user_review/iteration_limit), and per-iteration commits. Updated implement.md with auto-resume documentation.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added Stage 6a to skill-implementer and skill-lean-implementation, updated Stage 4 delegation context in both skills, added Auto-Resume Behavior section to implement.md

next_steps: Review implementation and test with a multi-phase task
